location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to Captain George Brown Walker, Commander of the HC Cruizer Benaresand Senior Marine Officer in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Senior Marine Officer that it is the Resident's intention to be absent from Bushire from July to October 1825, and he plans on making a trip to the Arabian coast on his return. The letter therefore requests that the Elphinstoneis dispatched to Bushire in time to covey the Resident on his tour.
